channel.title: Fractals on Michael Skirpan's Personal Webpage

item.title: Fractal trees in D3
item.description: Making your own fractal trees At the time of writing, I am in an amazing class entitled Chaotic Dynamics by a wonderfully edifying instructor - Liz Bradley. Last week when we were studying fractals, I went a bit overboard and wrote a Javascript application that builds a Cantor-like set and then allows you to see the result of the set as a tree which has fractal properties. Please play around with it here
